item.title: Re: hanging out via friend points
item.content:encoded:
It should be noted that you still get the +30 Stamina on the day you hang out with Shorty. So:

Monday - Grind enough FP.
Tuesday - Hangout w/ Shorty, +30 Stamina from Mood Ring, Cheaper Jutsu, etc.
Wednesday - +100 Stamina from Silver Hairpin. No longer hanging out with Shorty (Unless you ground more friendship with her, I suppose. Never tried it.)

item.title: Re: hanging out via friend points
item.content:encoded:
If you have enough FPs, you hang out with them the next day. Mood ring gives you the bonus the day you hang out with them.

Monday - Gather enough FPs
Tuesday - Hang out
Still Tuesday - +30 Stamina from Glowing Mood Ring

The exception would be Shorty and the Silver Hairpin, which gives you the stamina bonus the day after you hang out…

Monday - Gather enough FPs
Tuesday - Hang out
Wednesday - +100 Stamina from Silver Hairpin
